description: Pattern-based deduction detection rules for Australian tax compliance (Level 2)

patterns.reason: Office supplies and stationery for work purposes

patterns.substantiation_notes: Items over $300 require receipts. May qualify for instant asset write-off if under threshold.
Must be used primarily for work. Consider depreciation for items over $300.

patterns.reason: Mobile phone expenses - consider work/personal usage split
patterns.substantiation_notes: Calculate work-related percentage. May need to apportion costs.

patterns.reason: Internet expenses - consider work/personal usage split
patterns.substantiation_notes: Calculate work-related percentage based on usage.
Trips over $75 require written evidence. Commuting to/from regular workplace NOT deductible.

patterns.reason: Vehicle expenses - consider cents per km or logbook method
patterns.substantiation_notes: Keep logbook or calculate km. Commuting NOT deductible.

patterns.reason: Personal groceries and food are not tax deductible for individuals
patterns.substantiation_notes: Not deductible for individuals. May be deductible for businesses in specific circumstances.

patterns.reason: Personal clothing is not tax deductible unless it is protective, occupation-specific, or uniform
patterns.substantiation_notes: Only protective clothing, occupation-specific clothing, or registered uniforms are deductible.
Must be occupation-specific or protective. Conventional clothing not deductible.
Must be directly related to earning income.

patterns.reason: Personal entertainment and dining expenses are not deductible
patterns.substantiation_notes: Not deductible unless it is a valid business meal meeting specific criteria.
Must be directly related to current work or income-earning activities.

substantiation_thresholds.description: ATO substantiation thresholds - amounts requiring written evidence

commuting_hours.description: Time periods indicating likely commuting (NOT deductible)

instant_asset_write_off.description: Instant asset write-off threshold (check current ATO guidelines)
instant_asset_write_off.notes: Assets under this amount may be immediately deductible. Verify current year threshold.

confidence_scoring.high: Clear patterns matching deductible/non-deductible categories with minimal ambiguity
confidence_scoring.medium: Likely deductible but requires additional context or apportionment
confidence_scoring.low: Ambiguous - needs manual review or additional information

disclaimer: This is automated pattern matching only. Rules are based on general ATO guidelines and may not apply to individual circumstances. Always consult a registered tax agent for specific advice.
